resources.string: Punjai is a crowdsourcing platform that users can donate for events. This application is a channel for gathering foundations that need help and support by raising funds from people who need to support various activities and society. This application contains an information and donation sharing channel of all foundations which associate with Punjai. Donors can donate their money directly to the foundation so donors can make sure that the foundation receives their money. All of this can lead to the benefits of the application.

UNICEF is ramping up its response for affected children and families to expand access to healthcare, water, sanitation and hygiene. UNICEF is providing vaccines, life-saving therapeutic food and other basic necessities to keep children alive. We are also supporting restoring essential public services, schools, healthcare and laying the groundwork for longer term recovery and development.
Support children affected by the cyclones in Southern Africa
Already have an account? Log in here
Donate to an Education Charity in Thailand

Children need to be shown that they have value in the world. By providing them with the resources they need, encouragement and a lot of love and guidance, children will learn they have value as human beings. The task of UNICEF is to address any and all impediments that prevent children from achieving their true potential.
